projects.title: Neural Insights
projects.description: An AI-powered analytics platform that provides real-time insights from unstructured data using advanced NLP and machine learning.
projects.challenge: Processing millions of documents in real-time while maintaining accuracy.
projects.solution: Implemented distributed computing with optimized ML models achieving 95% accuracy.
projects.results: Reduced analysis time by 80% and increased decision-making speed by 3x.

projects.title: StreamLine Commerce
projects.description: A next-generation e-commerce platform with AI-powered recommendations and seamless checkout experience.
projects.challenge: Building a scalable platform handling 10k+ concurrent users.
projects.solution: Microservices architecture with CDN optimization and caching strategies.
projects.results: 99.9% uptime with 40% increase in conversion rates.

projects.title: HealthPulse
projects.description: A comprehensive telemedicine platform connecting patients with healthcare providers through video consultations and AI triage.
